data.oai_dc:dc: Genotype data for one individual at 20 microsatellites. The microsatellite genotypes for the remaining individuals are available in a previous Dryad entry, doi:10.5061/dryad.8m0t6 <https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.8m0t6>. The format of the data in the current Dryad entry is the same as the previous entry, except in the current entry there is no sex data column.
double-digest restriction-site associated DNA (ddRAD)|low coverage|next-generation sequencing|pedigree|population genomics|relationships
